page.title: 07 ENTERTAINMENT IN MYDDLE
page.content: In {Myddle}there is quite alot of {Entertainment,}there is a{Youth Club on a Tuesday,{Bingo}on the first Monday in the month,{Womens Club}once a month,{Mothers}and {Toddlers}every Tuesday,{Carol Singing }at Christmas,{ {Keep Fit }on a Thursday, {Dominoes } every Thursday night, and {Darts}on a Tuesday.There is a{Bonfire Night, The {Dominoes }and {Darts}are at the { {Red Lion}and all the rest are at the { {Village Hall. The {Hall}is made of bricks and the old part is made of sand stone,It was built in 1830 and that is the{ {Entertain }in {Myddle, }and a lot More like {Mothers Union}once a month, there is a Christmas and New Years Eve {Party, Coffee Morning, Summer Fair, {Church fair }and the {P.T.A Dance }and that is all the {Entertainment. { }
